Implement Phase 6: JavaScript - Add Task Functionality

GOAL:  Implement adding new tasks via input field and button.

TASKS:
- Add click event listener to Add button
- Add keydown event listener to input for Enter key
- Validate input is not empty or whitespace-only
- Create new task object with unique ID, text, completed=false, current timestamp
- Add new task to end of tasks array
- Save updated tasks to localStorage
- Clear input field after successful add
- Re-render task list
- Hide empty state when tasks exist

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Clicking Add button creates new task from input text
- Pressing Enter in input field creates new task
- Empty or whitespace-only input is ignored (no task created)
- New tasks appear at bottom of list
- Input field clears after adding task
- Tasks save to localStorage immediately
- Empty state message hides when tasks exist
